name: HellRain
description:
.A Fast-Paced, Wave Based Survival FPS Made in 3 Days For a Self Game Jam, It Was Expanded Over Another 3 Days and Received Multiplayer Mode With Arena Shooter Maps.

.The Game Progresses With a Wave System Which Progressively Increases in Difficulty.

.Made With Kenny's Art Assets: https://kenney.nl/assets.
